Equipment Actions.Action 1: Snake Hair, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 4 Piercing plus 14 Poison
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Shortsword, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 5 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 3: Longbow, Ranged Weapon Attack, Range: 150/600ft, Average Damage: 6 Piercing plus 7 Poison

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Medusa makes either 3 attacks melee attacks, one with its Snake Hair and two with its Shortsword, or two ranged attacks with its Longbow

Abilities.Ability 1: Petrifying Gaze, When a creature that can see the Medusa's eyes starts its turn, the Medusa attempts to petrify the creature by forcing a Constitution saving throw.  Many great heroes and legends are told of Gorgons and the legendary Medusa, but few survive direct combat due to this cursed affect
